definitions.definition: The generally unidirectional movement of a gas or fluid .
The part of a fluid that moves continuously in a certain direction, especially ( oceanography ) ellipsis of ocean current .
The amount of electric charge flowing in each unit of time.
A tendency or a course of events .

main_definition: The generally unidirectional movement of a gas or fluid .
secondary_definitions: The part of a fluid that moves continuously in a certain direction, especially ( oceanography ) ellipsis of ocean current .
( electricity ) The amount of electric charge flowing in each unit of time.
A tendency or a course of events .
